scripts.build: yarn run build:cpp && yarn run build:pyi
scripts.build:cpp: cross-var pipenv run python python/build.py --build_type $npm_package_config_buildtype -l $npm_package_config_loglevel --arch $npm_package_config_arch --runtime $npm_package_config_runtime --node_version $npm_package_config_node make
scripts.build:pyi: cross-var pipenv run python python/build.py --build_type $npm_package_config_buildtype -l $npm_package_config_loglevel --arch $npm_package_config_arch --runtime $npm_package_config_runtime --node_version $npm_package_config_node package
scripts.configure: cross-var pipenv run python python/build.py --build_type $npm_package_config_buildtype -l $npm_package_config_loglevel --arch $npm_package_config_arch --runtime $npm_package_config_runtime --node_version $npm_package_config_node configure
